0.text: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).
0.html: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).

1.text: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining  6.
1.html: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining 6.
markedPassages: 6

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.
1.html: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.

1.text:
Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to  critically strike.
Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
1.html:
Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to critically strike.
Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: critically strike
cast-inhibiting crowd control

2.html: Blue Card Bonus: Restores  mana.
markedPassages: mana

3.text: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
3.html: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies, slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

4.text: Gold Card Bonus:  Stuns the target for a duration.
4.html: Gold Card Bonus: Stuns the target for a duration.
markedPassages: Stuns

0.text: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
0.html:
Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, which stacks up to 3 times.

At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions,  revealing them for a few seconds. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions, revealing them for a few seconds. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate  channels for 1.5 seconds before  blinking to the target location,  destroying all  projectiles targeting him in the process.
1.html: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate channels for 1.5 seconds before blinking to the target location, destroying all projectiles targeting him in the process.

blinking
destroying

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.

1.originHTML: +  350

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to enemies struck within and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to enemies struck within and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ENERGIZED: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
